Verses: 2 idho, Ummudaiya Saththurukkal Kondhaliththu, Ummudaiya Pagaignar Thalaiyedukkiraargal.
3 umadhu Janaththukku Virodhamaaga Ubaaya Thandhirangalai Yosiththu, Umadhu Maraivilirukkiravargalukku Virodhamaaga Aalosanaipannugiraargal.
4 avargal Ini Oru Jaadhiyaaraayiraamalum, Isravelin Per Ini Ninaikkappadaamalum Povadharkaaga, Avargalai Adhampannuvom Vaarungal Engiraargal.
5 ippadi, Edhomin Koodaaraththaarum, Ismavelarum, Movaabiyarum, Aagaariyarum,
6 kepaalarum, Ammoniyarum, Amalekkiyarum, Theeruvin Kudigalodukoodiya Pelistharum,
8 aseeriyarum Avargalodekoodak Kalandhu, Loththin Puththirarukkup Puyabalamaanaargal. (selaa.)
9 meedhiyaaniyarukkuch Seydhadhupolavum, Keeson Ennum Aatrandai Endhorile Azhikkappattu,
10 nilaththukku Eruvaaippona Siseraa, Yaapeen Enbavargalukkuch Seydhadhupolavum, Avargalukkuch Seyyum.
11 avargalaiyum Avargal Adhibadhigalaiyum Orebukkum Sebukkum, Avargal Pirabukkalaiyellaam Sebaavukkum Salmunaavukkum Samamaakkum.
12 dhevanudaiya Vaasasthalangalai Engalukkuch Sudhandharamaaga Naangal Kattikkolvom Endru Sollugiraargale.
13 en Dhevane, Avargalaich Suzhalkaatrin Puzhudhikkum, Kaatrumugaththil Parakkum Thurumbukkum Samamaakkum.
14 neruppu Kaattaik Koluththuvadhupolavum, Akkinijuvaalaigal Malaigalai Erippadhupolavum,
15 neer Umadhu Pusalinaale Avargalaith Thodarndhu, Umadhu Perungaatrinaale Avargalaik Kalangappannum.
16 karththaave, Avargal Umadhu Naamaththaith Thedumpadikku, Avargal Mugangalai Avamaanaththaale Moodum.
17 yegovaa Ennum Naamaththaiyudaiya Dhevareer Oruvare Boomiyanaiththinmelum Unnadhamaanavar Endru Manushar Unarumpadi,
